channel.title: Hp stays the same
channel.description: Hi, on my 317 server (pk planet source, delta) When someone eats or dies their hp stays the same. does anyone have a solution?

item.title: Hp stays the same
item.dc:creator: @bluescapepkz bluescapepkz
item.description:
@bluescapepkz wrote:

Thanks that worked but now there’s the matter of eating. When someone eats, their hp isn’t changed.

Read full topic

item.title: Hp stays the same
item.dc:creator: @raulhenriq raulhenriq
item.description:
@raulhenriq wrote:

Search for if (deathStage == 1) in your client.java. The thing is that you must add the something to set the hp to the player current hp level when it dies, the original code of some sources are:

sendFrame126(“Prayer: “+playerLevel[5]+”/”+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 687);
resetfollowers();
refreshSkills();
killMyNPCs();
resetKnight();
skulledBy = “”;

currentHealth = 1;

That currenthealth is the problem. In that case the hp will be set to 1 when the player dies, so the right code would be:

currentHealth = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);

Because playerlevel 3 is hp.
If it doesnt work then just try to rewrite what i just said, such as getLevelForXPplayerXP[3]; or something, gl.

Read full topic
